**Describe the bug**
Please indicate if you experienced a crash to desktop, an error popup (freeze-frame), or another issue: <Which of the three you experienced>

Add a clear and concise description of what the bug is here.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behaviour:
1. Go to (...)
2. Do (...)
3. (...) is not working

**Expected behaviour**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots or a upload a video to help explain the problem.

**Logs**
Please navigate to `%appdata%\r2modmanPlus-local\HadesII\profiles\Default\ReturnOfModding` (replace `Default` with your profile name) and attach the `LogOutput.log` file to this issue. If a file ending in `.dmp` exists in this folder, also attach it please. This will be created if your crash was a crash-to-desktop.

**Save File**
If you can reproduce the bug on your save file, please create a `.zip` of all files starting with `Profile<Your Save Slot>` located in `C:\Users\<username>\Saved Games\Hades II`
